785c4033-5d10-416b-a21a-125610786adf.description: To provide a comprehensive view of sustainability from a strategic and value creation perspective. To understand each of the areas that make up the ESG vision, its actors and implications. To know which investment strategies with ESG criteria exist and how they affect financial advice.
785c4033-5d10-416b-a21a-125610786adf.name: Santander ESG Commitment Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: End of Video section knowledge check Explores understanding through the SME interactive Case study Final assessment outcomes – benchmarking of the assessment with minimum pass rate based on Learning Objectives. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

40a05974-d118-4b9e-939b-201a79db90af.description: Our world is being transformed by the digital revolution. Banking industry is facing a wave of disruption. Not only technology and society are changing, but the whole industry DNA are undergoing a transformation. This digital reality is moving technology to the core of our business. As part of this learning plan, you will explore some of the technologies that are accelerating this change, its impact in the CIB industry and in SCIB. Be part of the change!
40a05974-d118-4b9e-939b-201a79db90af.name: Digital Transformation Mindset powerd by SCIB

badge_template_activities.title: To get this Badge you must (1) complete the 6 elearnings that compose it and (2) obtain 80% of correct answer in a final evaluation questionnaire. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

ecc16363-ad0c-497c-8a12-66201c7e425b.description: In module 1, you will learn about the history of this discipline, who introduced these new concepts and its principles that challenge neoclassical economic theory. You will be guided to detect irrationality in day-to-day situations. You will understand how decision making happens as System 1 and System 2 is explained. Biases, how they operate and their consequences will be explained too. To finish this section, you will learn about “nudges” and how they are used to encourage targeted behavior.
ecc16363-ad0c-497c-8a12-66201c7e425b.name: Understanding decision making through Behavioural Economics

badge_template_activities.title: (1) Having successfully completed the 3 modules that comprise the e-learning. (2) Having passed the evaluation questionnaire with at least an 80% of correct answers. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

cc8757af-2b83-4fa7-bc78-e0d1c7a55c64.description: This badge introduces the main concepts about Customer Experience at a basic level. It certifies knowledge about what Customer Experience is, how it is applied in Santander, what are the differences with User Interface and User Experience, as well as the metrics used and their importance.
cc8757af-2b83-4fa7-bc78-e0d1c7a55c64.name: Customer Experience Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: (1) Complete the 4 modules on Learning Plan "CX: La receta del éxito", and (2) pass the test with at least 70% correct answers. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

f48eadea-88d7-4dca-aea5-06b78accf63e.description: Take the first step into product and service management with the courses that make up this badge. Throughout this journey, you will learn everything you need to manage your product or service, from the necessary mindset to techniques and tools. You will learn to identify your stakeholders and manage them properly, you will identify the principles and benefits of agile budget management and the tool used by the Santander Group: Business Case.
f48eadea-88d7-4dca-aea5-06b78accf63e.name: Product/Service Management I

badge_template_activities.title: (1) Having successfully completed the 4 courses that comprise the Badge. (2) Having passed the evaluation questionnaire with at least an 80% of correct answers. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

fcb5356e-360b-4397-a826-69f064846219.description: This badge explores the foundational concepts of digital banking customer behavior and the use of different channels to manage them remotely. Do you want to know how? Completing the following two learning plans: (1) "Más cerca del cliente” composed by 6 modules. (2) "Rutas de los clientes digitales" composed by 5 modules. In both you must pass the exam with at least 70% correct answers. Certify your knowledge about sales and customer relationship skills in the face of the omnichannel challenge!
fcb5356e-360b-4397-a826-69f064846219.name: Remote customer management

badge_template_activities.title: (1) Click here to access "Más cerca del cliente".
(2) Click here to access "Rutas de los clientes digitales".

28f8fabc-7ca1-40a2-bee8-cc04541f59d8.description: In a world where we hear cloud technology talked about, and where our photos are now stored on our phone, we invite you to learn what exactly 'Cloud Technology is, how business of all sizes including Santander can benefit, where you may see it across the bank and the possibilities. On completion, your new awareness will be recognised though a Dojo Badge.
28f8fabc-7ca1-40a2-bee8-cc04541f59d8.name: Digital Fluency - Cloud

badge_template_activities.title: (1) End of Video section knowledge check. (2) Explores understanding through the SME interactive Case study. (3) Final assessment outcomes – benchmarking of the assessment with minimum pass rate based on Learning Objectives. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information. The assignment of this badge will depend on your local L&D.

c6f53a95-89a5-4445-a046-8dd899308ca0.description: Throughout this learning you'll be able to apply a continuous improvement methodology on complex and massive processes with customer focus. You´ll also learn the DMAIC roadmap and tools to remove waste and reduce variation in the processes.
c6f53a95-89a5-4445-a046-8dd899308ca0.name: Lean Six Sigma - White Belt

badge_template_activities.title: (1) Complete all modules - (2) Pass the final evaluation with a minimum of 70%. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

0d280fb8-d0c3-4327-b0ac-cf5237e4efef.description: By the end of this learning you will be able to demonstrate and understand the basic concepts of effective communications and the tools to help identify how to adapt your communication style based on customer preferences. You'll also learn how communication can be used to build strong rapport and trust with your customers and ensure all customer conversations are memorable and engaging.
0d280fb8-d0c3-4327-b0ac-cf5237e4efef.name: Effective Customer Communication

badge_template_activities.title: (1) End of Video section knowledge check (2) Final assessment outcomes – benchmarking of the assessment with minimum pass rate based on Learning Objectives. Minimum pass grade is 80%. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

9a4019fe-a784-48a2-ba97-15fab7dfc236.description: Learn to manage yourself in changing environments with Be Agile and Agile Mindset. Get closer to Enterprise Agility Fundamentals, to help Santander Group employees stay at the forefront of innovation. Learn about the Business Agility model and internalize the need for transformation. Identifies good practices related to Customer Focus, for a positive impact on the business. Learn how to manage value delivery to grow your business with Business Development Fundamentals.
9a4019fe-a784-48a2-ba97-15fab7dfc236.name: Being Agile

badge_template_activities.title: Available in Spanish, Portugues, English. [1] Complete all the courses. [2] Pass the final test with a minimum of 80%. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

c16e7690-9b54-40f8-88ae-7c3a274251e0.description: Ensuring quality is one of the pillars of the Agile philosophy, as we are not only improving customer confidence in our product or service, we are also reducing the amount of rework, investment of resources and complexity of development and maintenance. Therefore, we must have the necessary mindset and knowledge in the testing area.
c16e7690-9b54-40f8-88ae-7c3a274251e0.name: Agile Testing Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: (1) Having successfully completed the 2 e-learnings that comprise the Badge. (2) Having passed the evaluation questionnaire with at least an 80% of correct answers. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

8b410422-6ca7-4af5-9701-9f511f0bb850.description: Your personal brand can show the skills and qualities that you hold, defining what makes you different from the rest of your colleagues. Throughout this learning you'll see how to identify where your personal brand is now and how to build and develop it in order to get to where you want it to be. You'll also learn how to use your personal brand when networking and how to make the most of it in both face to face and virtual scenarios.
8b410422-6ca7-4af5-9701-9f511f0bb850.name: Building Your Personal Brand

badge_template_activities.title: (1) End of Video section knowledge check (2) Final assessment outcomes – benchmarking of the assessment with minimum pass rate based on Learning Objectives. Minimum pass rate is 80%. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

68b8f83a-b0b6-4c2c-bf26-ff134ec23288.description: DevOps focuses on constant testing and delivery while the Agile process focuses on constant changes. DevOps requires relatively a large team while Agile requires a small team. DevOps leverages both shifts left and right principles, on the other hand, Agile leverage shift-left principle. In this learning plan, you'll learn the principles and values of Agile & DevOps and how they have transformed the way of thinking, working, communicating, and collaborating.
68b8f83a-b0b6-4c2c-bf26-ff134ec23288.name: Digital Fluency - Agile & DevOps

badge_template_activities.title: The participant must complete all the courses and evaluations contained in the learning plan to earn the badge. The assignment of this badge will depend on your local L&D.

a9e5e94b-3d41-4361-ab1f-5296a4dfbd30.description: It's time to make things happen!Develop strategies and skills to organise and visualise work thanks to Kanban.Discover the main metrics to better understand your processes.Bet on continuous improvement and increase your efficiency with Lean and Scrum approaches.Learn about Design Thinking and Lean Startup, to revolutionise the way you design solutions, products and services.Learn how to improve collaboration with the DevOps shared workflow.
a9e5e94b-3d41-4361-ab1f-5296a4dfbd30.name: Doing Agile

badge_template_activities.title: [1] Complete all the courses. [2] Pass the final test with a minimum of 80%

32a694bb-47ee-4259-a6a2-8e9872b9046a.description: In the new environment, having a data-driven mindset is key for building the Bank of the future. Through this learning plan you'll see how to identify business opportunities by using data and analytics, understand some basic concepts (such as AI or ML); the importance of data management and governance processes to ensure “healthy” data; and learn how to use data and advanced analytics in a responsible way.
32a694bb-47ee-4259-a6a2-8e9872b9046a.name: Data Beginners

badge_template_activities.title: [1] Complete the four course [2} Passing final evaluations at least with 80% in each of them.

081f423d-fd02-460a-bd69-c6725580a893.description: DevOps is not a framework or a workflow. It's a culture that allows to generate a high performance organization through practices, tools and skills. With DevOps, changes make it to production faster, resources are easier to share and large-scale systems are easier to manage and maintain. In this learning path you will learn the DevOps basics, explore the various tools, technologies, and vocabularies surrounding the continuous integration, and get a basic understanding of continuous delivery.
081f423d-fd02-460a-bd69-c6725580a893.name: Foundations of DevOps

badge_template_activities.title: (1) Having successfully completed all the e-learnings that comprise the Badge. (2) Having passed the evaluation questionnaire with at least an 80% of correct answers. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

14b34456-2eef-4932-ae48-c6b5736a8bf7.description: Increase efficiency in your decision-making, and discover how the company's strategy materializes to achieve its objectives with KPIs and OKRs. Understand how Santander has implemented the Agile framework beyond the team level with Scaling Agile at Santander. Get to know Business Case, the key tool for developing yourself as an intrapreneur and reaching your full potential with the new business development initiatives.
14b34456-2eef-4932-ae48-c6b5736a8bf7.name: Leading in Agile

badge_template_activities.title: [1] Complete all the courses. [2] Pass the final test with a minimum of 80%

dc1cbc01-c0e8-487f-a4e5-2ebf608ed412.description: Get a head start on learning the fundamentals of software development by taking the courses that make up this badge. You will learn everything you need to achieve an agile approach in software development, the basics of architecture, what security aspects to consider and how release management works for an application. Also, you will learn about the impact continuity has on software delivery, as well as cloud computing foundations that support it.
dc1cbc01-c0e8-487f-a4e5-2ebf608ed412.name: Engineering fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: (1) Having successfully completed the 6 courses that comprise the Badge. (2) Having passed the evaluation questionnaire with at least an 80% of correct answers. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

55269d92-489b-424f-944e-0c4add7fa82f.description: This badge prepares the earner to work in Agile teams. It certifies the application of Lean-Agile principles on distributed and mixed environments and raises awareness about why metrics are important. This badge is temporarily disabled. We will announce opening dates soon.
55269d92-489b-424f-944e-0c4add7fa82f.name: Agile Framework for Teams

badge_template_activities.title: (1) Successfully complete four training experiences. (2) Complete the assessment. (3) Carry out the suggested Learning Lab's tasks. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

9f5fdc5c-678d-4123-b2f3-692f84131487.description: Digital Fluency – UX Learning. In this learning plan you will learn: Developing personas, user stories, and user journey maps. Conducting usability studies Creating wireframes and prototypes. Testing and iterating on designs. Building a professional portfolio. On completion, your new awareness will be recognised though a Dojo Badge.
9f5fdc5c-678d-4123-b2f3-692f84131487.name: Digital Fluency - UX

badge_template_activities.title: The participant must complete all the courses and evaluations contained in the learning plan to earn the badge. The assignment of this badge will depend on your local L&D.

706ac9ec-c780-4e60-9eca-e971da782c3a.description: Data First provides critical analytical insights to support the formulation of new ideas or solutions, drive operational and strategic decision-making, and foster a data-driven understanding of our customers. To do this, we will learn the basic topics of statistics, programming, database management and visualization.
706ac9ec-c780-4e60-9eca-e971da782c3a.name: Data Driven Decision Making Program: Data First

badge_template_activities.title: This learning plan includes (1) 12 topics with their corresponding practical application exercises, conceptual video pills, as well as a (2) practical tasks in each topic; all this oriented to the development of 4 skills. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

dac78951-842b-4b88-b6f7-33b80be6a36c.description: Blockchain & Cryptocurrency – “this will never take off” commonly thought! but the boundaries and exploration of other currencies and how they are created and exchanged are growing. Awareness of this revolution will only increase our overall digital skills proficiencies and understanding of the digital world we all live in, and enable more comfortable conversations on the realities and questions it brings.
dac78951-842b-4b88-b6f7-33b80be6a36c.name: Digital Fluency - Blockchain & Cryptocurrency

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the learning and completion of the assessment. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

0747abbb-7c11-46a5-8391-d75862749f6b.description: Digital Fluency – Coding: About this learning plan “Computer programming and coding have nothing to do my role” – this may be how this feels for you – however understanding the importance of code in all our everyday functions, the accuracy required, for quality data and how critical it is to the customer journey is vital for us. No more changes for coding. On completion, your new awareness will be recognised though a Dojo Badge.
0747abbb-7c11-46a5-8391-d75862749f6b.name: Digital Fluency – Coding

badge_template_activities.title: The participant must complete all the courses and evaluations contained in the learning plan to earn the badge. The assignment of this badge will depend on your local L&D.

452000b2-4b2b-4d29-9d2c-a3faacac848a.description: From this learning, you'll understand what Social Tools are, and the benefits they bring and how Santander use social tools within the organisation. You'll be able to know how social tools help Santander to better understand customers and develop products. You will be able to have comfortable conversations about the use of social tools and how they may impact your role and understand the opportunities created with Social Tools for Digital transformation.
452000b2-4b2b-4d29-9d2c-a3faacac848a.name: Digital Fluency - Communication & Social Tools

badge_template_activities.title: Complete e-learning for Social Tools and Communications and approve the combined assessment. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

97720c57-5d75-4536-a816-48f028cbb02d.description: Here you will learning about the the lifecycle of Data from how data is created, how data is managed and kept secure, how data can be enriched and how data can add value. You will gain an insight in to how Santander can (and does) leverage data to gain value, improve innovation, better understand customers and provide products.
97720c57-5d75-4536-a816-48f028cbb02d.name: Digital Fluency - Data

badge_template_activities.title: [1] Completion of e-learning and the assessment. [2] 100% correct answers for the assessment.

2445154e-4b9f-4c29-aed3-0fd2b2475ac0.description: Our world is being transformed by digitalization. Banking industry is facing a wave of disruption. Not only technology and society are changing, but the whole industry DNA are undergoing a transformation. Digitalization is moving technology to the core of our business.This learning plan will help you to understand the current Digital Business Transformation and how it impacts in Santander. Be part of the change!
2445154e-4b9f-4c29-aed3-0fd2b2475ac0.name: Digital Mindset

badge_template_activities.title: To get this Badge you must (1) complete the 6 elearnings that compose it and (2) obtain 80% of correct answer in a final evaluation questionnaire. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

1bd8f69b-6c89-484e-9bdd-84047633240d.description: This badge covers: (1) Organisation paradigms to understand, support and sustain organisational change processes. (2) How to properly prepare for an organisational change initiative. (3) Preparing people for organisational change. (3) How to be motivational in ways that's empathetic towards peoples' roles and personalities. (4) A clear framework of roles, skills and activities which leaders can support and sustain the change process.
1bd8f69b-6c89-484e-9bdd-84047633240d.name: Change Management: Owner

badge_template_activities.title: End of LinkedIn learning content knowledge checks. Assessment score of 80% or more in final assessment. Using what you have learnt, work through the questions most relevant to you and your team and use Workday to keep a record of your progress and success. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

60f54c7e-5cf9-4011-ac52-65341085044e.description: Become an effective team member involved in organisational change projects. This badge will cover: (1) How the process of organisational change or transformation occurs. (2) How people react to organisational change and how to help them adapt. (3) How to develop strategies to keep people motivated while an organisation undergoes change. (4) The different types of change process e.g. planned and emergent change. (5) How to keep stakeholders engaged while an organisation undergoes change.
60f54c7e-5cf9-4011-ac52-65341085044e.name: Change Management: Advocate

badge_template_activities.title: End of LinkedIn learning content knowledge checks. Assessment score of 80% or more in final assessment. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

0d0ec65b-3caf-4d1a-954a-6dbf46caf196.description: Use Uber, Google, Air B’n’B, Booking.com, open table? You’re already a platform expert! Platforms of these types have disrupted and revolutionised the traditional consumer buying and selling market and created new business models – take a look at Santander Navigator helping us to evolve, with not just the systems we use but the understanding of what today's consumer expects.
0d0ec65b-3caf-4d1a-954a-6dbf46caf196.name: Digital Fluency - Platforms

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the learning and approve the assessment. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

ea6961dc-2ea2-436d-984c-45d6bb6345c7.description: Through this badge you will learn the techniques and tools needed to perform and integrate the basic test automation processes in a more efficient way, which will help to meet specifications and quality standards.
ea6961dc-2ea2-436d-984c-45d6bb6345c7.name: Test Automation Fundamentals

badge_template_activities.title: (1) Complete all the required courses (2) Pass the test with more than a 80%. Complete the study of the contents by clicking on View additional information.

f55679c0-dc9e-489e-b3e1-ba4f459c28ba.description: It's no secret that we are already on our way to becoming a digital bank of the future. For this to happen, we need all of our colleagues to speak the same digital language and foster a mindset that makes digital transformation possible. As an organisation it's important that we recognise the changing landscape that technology brings to our business. By earning this badge, you will be able to expand your knowledge and skills. This will help you continue to help our customers succeed!
f55679c0-dc9e-489e-b3e1-ba4f459c28ba.name: Digital Fluency - Knowledge

badge_template_activities.title: Successfully complete the content of all badges involved.
